name: Igglybuff
author: Atsuko Nishida
flavor_text: Its extremely flexible and elastic body makes it bounce continuously—anytime, anywhere.

poke_body.name: Sweet Sleeping Face
poke_body.effect: As long as Igglybuff is Asleep, prevent all damage done to Igglybuff by attacks.

attacks.name: Graffiti
attacks.effect: Igglybuff is now Asleep. During your opponent’s next turn, the attack cost of each of the Defending Pokémon’s attacks is {C} more.
